translation: ’Alif lām mīm. (Allāhu ló mọ ohun tí Ó gbàlérò pẹ̀lú àwọn háràfí náà.)[1]
footnotes: 1. Nítorí kí a lè mọ ìdí pàtàkì tí Allāhu ṣe fi sūrah yìí sọrí mọ̀lẹ́bí ‘Imrọ̄n, òbí Mọryam, ìyá Ànábì ‘Isā - kí ọlà Allāhu máa bá a -, ẹ wo ìtọsẹ̀-ọ̀rọ̀ sūrah Mọryam. Ẹ wo ìtọsẹ̀-ọ̀rọ̀ sūrah al Baƙọrah; 2:1.
